attributes.action: Dissolve the house of Lords and replace with working class conscripts
attributes.additional_details: We need a balance of wealthy people and poor people to correctly govern the UK. At present we have no balance, both houses are full of individuals with privileged backgrounds.To restore balance we need a house to represent the not so fortunate of the UK i.e low paid workers, people who live in poorer areas, people without the chance to change their lives. I propose we dissolve the House of Lords and replace it with annual conscripts selected from the masses thus restoring the balance.
attributes.background: We are in a situation where the house of commons appears to not represents the working class people of Great Britain. It is seen by most working class people to be an extension of the House of Lords.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by conscripts. You could start a new petition calling for the current House of Lords to be dissolved, and replaced with a new appointment process.
